honestCheckScreen.beforeBeginInfo: let's agree: It is important that you answer my questions as honestly as possible. I won't show your answers to anyone, and they will stay just between us! The more honest you are in your responses, the more I can help you.

testBeginningScreen.introductoryText: women unlocked their full potential, transformed their Sex Life and improved their relationships

confidentCheckScreen.confidentFeelQuestion: Do you feel physically confident and satisfied?

currentRelationshipScreen.stageCheckQuestion: How satisfied are you with your current relationship with your partner?
currentRelationshipScreen.breakingUpStageButton: You're on the verge of breaking up.
currentRelationshipScreen.difficultQuestionButton: I find it difficult to answer.

candidlyCheckScreen.title: Sure thing, it seems we have something to talk about candidly!
candidlyCheckScreen.supportText: Remember, we agreed - we're answering as honestly as possible!

relationshipIssuesScreen.question: What relationship issue is currently bothering you the most?
relationshipIssuesScreen.noCommonInterestsIssueText: We have different values and outlooks on life. No common interests.
relationshipIssuesScreen.understandingIssueText: Lack of understanding with my partner. We can't have an open and calm dialogue.
relationshipIssuesScreen.domesticIssueText: Domestic issues in the relationship. We can't cope with them.
relationshipIssuesScreen.boredomIssueText: Boredom. Sex has become bland and uninteresting, my partner doesn't want to try anything new, and I haven't been on a date in a long time.
relationshipIssuesScreen.interestIssueText: I see that he's more interested in other girls than in me.

boredomDiscussionScreen.title: Sometimes, even in the happiest relationships
boredomDiscussionScreen.text: partners can become bored. It all started so brightly: the bouquet-and-candy period of courtship, passion, romance, intense sex, long conversations throughout the night...
boredomDiscussionScreen.question: But now it's routine, monotonous, and no signs of attention.

checkPartnerOpennessScreen.title: Before giving you a cool, important piece of advice
checkPartnerOpennessScreen.text: I need to know a few more things from you. Please answer honestly, remember, we agreed on that.
checkPartnerOpennessScreen.question: Can you say that you're completely open with your partner 100%?

relationshipOpennessScreen.title: Darling, you're really clever
relationshipOpennessScreen.text: It's great that you're open. And I hope your partner is also 100% open with you.

relationshipDistantScreen.title: Darling, try to be completely open with them
relationshipDistantScreen.text: Sometimes we see a problem but we don't want to solve it ourselves or take the first steps. Take the first step and you'll see, the first changes won't make you wait.

educationTimeCheckScreen.question: How much time are you ready to spend learning how to transform your Sex LIfe?

somethingNewReadinessScreen.question: Do you want to explore your partner in bed "from A to Z" and try something new?

elevateSexualPotentialScreen.question: Are you looking to elevate your sexual experiences and eliminate monotony and dullness?

enticingOneScreen.question: Do you aspire to be the enticing one who leaves a man <strong>breathless?</strong?

intimateLifeCheckScreen.title: I'm asking you the final question
intimateLifeCheckScreen.rateText: sweetheart, and then we'll move on to the main thing! Rate your intimate life with your partner.
intimateLifeCheckScreen.goodOptionText: Good, but there's room for improvement.
intimateLifeCheckScreen.averageMinOptionText: Average, it's neither great nor terrible.

emailScreen.text: Enter your email to design your Sex life transformation
emailScreen.newsletterText: I'd like to receive valuable insights, exclusive offers, and the latest news straight to my inbox!

goodTestResultsScreen.title: Your Sex life transformation is waiting for you!
goodTestResultsScreen.text: Honey, that's awesome! But you do know that there's no limit to perfection, right? I'm offering you something even greater!

averageTestResultsScreen.title: Your Sex life transformation is waiting for you!
averageTestResultsScreen.text: Well well well, looks like we have some issues of dissatisfaction here!

unsatisfactoryTestResultsScreen.title: Your Sex life transformation is waiting for you!
unsatisfactoryTestResultsScreen.text: Well well well, I see some serious problems here.
